title: Balance Meditation: Cultivating Stillness in Body and Mind
author: Steven Handel
description: Try this simple "Balance Meditation" to cultivate stillness in both body and mind.
cleaned_text: Any sense or element of our experience can become an object of meditation, including your sense of balance. Try this simple "Balance Meditation" to cultivate stillness in both body and mind. This content is for Monthly, Yearly, and Lifetime members
